text: NGC 435 is a spiral galaxy of type SAB(s)d: located in the constellation Cetus. It was discovered on October 23, 1864 by Albert Marth. It was described by Dreyer as "extremely faint, small, extended." ==References== ==External links== * 0435 18641023 Category:Cetus (constellation) Category:Spiral galaxies
title: NGC 435
